item.title: Comfort++
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Buses have come a long way!

item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Over the last few months, I have been able to drastically reduce the digital clutter with two key tools - Anonaddy and KTN. Anonaddy lets you spin up email aliases on-the-go and sever them as needed.Â  KTN let’s you subscribe to newsletters in your feed reader via RSS. Pretty cool concept and I love how easy it is to use! Highly recommend!

item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: That’s one neat, much-needed reminder!
